name: Pepperoni Gone Wild
description:
New adventures with Pepperoni on his journey as a pizza delivery man.  Somewhere on the way to prepare for delivery of food or pizza packages to customers.

 Instantly Pepperoni thought for a moment and stopped on the side of the road with the aim of delivering to the customer's place.

 However, something like a rock falling from the hill startled Pepperoni on the spot, until finally Pepperoni was startled and went wild as the rock rolled after him.

 And finally the Pepperoni rushed to step on the gas and immediately went fast, until he faced problems on the road that blocked him from avoiding him.

 In game features:

 • There are several menu instructions before the game starts.

 • Enough with the easy touch screen to run it.

 • Sound setting menu is available to set in silent mode or easy to set sound.

 • An explanation menu is available regarding the superiority value for the rating value.
